com.msn.gabrielle.backend

Class CategoryService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.msn.gabrielle.backend.CategoryService

  • public class CategoryService
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple backend service to store and retrieve Category instances.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static CategoryService getInstance()
        Gets the unique instance of this Singleton.
        Returns:
        the unique instance of this Singleton

      • getUndefinedCategory

        public Category getUndefinedCategory()
        Returns a dedicated undefined category.
        Returns:
        the undefined category

      • findCategories

        public java.util.List<Category> findCategories(java.lang.String filter)
        Fetches the categories whose name matches the given filter text. The matching is case insensitive. When passed an empty filter text, the method returns all categories. The returned list is ordered by name.
        Parameters:
        filter - the filter text
        Returns:
        the list of matching categories

      • findCategoryByName

        public java.util.Optional<Category> findCategoryByName(java.lang.String name)
        Searches for the exact category whose name matches the given filter text. The matching is case insensitive.
        Parameters:
        name - the filter text
        Returns:
        an Optional containing the category if found, or Optional.empty()
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the result is ambiguous

      • findCategoryOrThrow

        public Category findCategoryOrThrow(java.lang.String name)
        Fetches the exact category whose name matches the given filter text. Behaves like findCategoryByName(String), except that returns a Category instead of an Optional. If the category can't be identified, an exception is thrown.
        Parameters:
        name - the filter text
        Returns:
        the category, if found
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if not exactly one category matches the given name

      • findCategoryById

        public java.util.Optional<Category> findCategoryById(java.lang.Long id)
        Searches for the exact category with the given id.
        Parameters:
        id - the category id
        Returns:
        an Optional containing the category if found, or Optional.empty()

      • deleteCategory

        public boolean deleteCategory(Category category)
        Deletes the given category from the category store.
        Parameters:
        category - the category to delete
        Returns:
        true if the operation was successful, otherwise false

      • saveCategory

        public void saveCategory(Category dto)
        Persists the given category into the category store. If the category is already persistent, the saved category will get updated with the name of the given category object. If the category is new (i.e. its id is null), it will get a new unique id before being saved.
        Parameters:
        dto - the category to save
